Theocratic Elective is a form of succession where vassals elect the ruler based on religious principles. Martial skill and Learning are highly prized, as if zeal and virtue.
Oligarchic Elective is a form of succession where vassals elect the ruler based on Republican principles. Skill in Diplomacy and Stewardship are valued, as is wealth.
[From.GetSheHeCap] has been educated as a Steward
This state is a colonial venture of some far-away empire.

Before Anaxorgos departed from the world of the mortals, he was asked who shall he appoint to rule in his stead. His answer was "to kratisto", meaning "to the best". As such his worshippers took his words to heart and made sure to select only the best and most powerful as their ruler through Kratocracy. Although this goverment often ensures a capable leader, it can just as much be the cause of infighting, with rulers warring and dueling for power.
